headline: Jim Cramer Admits He Got Emerson (EMR) Wrong
summary: We recently published 17 Stocks Jim Cramer Talked About. Emerson Electric Co. (NYSE:EMR) is one of the stocks that Jim Cramer talked about. Emerson Electric Co. (NYSE:EMR) is one of the largest industrial machinery manufacturers in the world. The firm makes and sells a variety of products such as valves, actuators, and cylinders. Its shares […]

headline: Enagás selects Emerson for digital management of Spain’s gas grid
summary: Enagás is utilising Emerson's AspenTech digital grid management solutions to operate and improve Spain's national gas transmission network.
